data.description:
FIGHT together against different enemies in the Hex7 Battle Arena.
DEFEND yourself with shield and sword and don't forget to RELOAD your guns once in awhile.
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/38974468_332017743231769_3438180485989163490_n.png?_nc_cat=105&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=iFW-b7xp96sQ7kNvgE40-8f&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYCekk9dTGWEMpK6SDNb3b3x_gHSEc7ukwZ00dhGnHqBcQ&oe=6698FAB7)
SURVIVE the first 7 ROUNDS.
Have FUN customizing your game a much as you like.
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/75507168_1446865232891556_3763410573840822716_n.png?_nc_cat=109&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=NfQQWBHZM-AQ7kNvgE33CL3&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYDnNn0j-amZTk5hUfDdoOhE20TI-Sr3dNus62LrsxhqEg&oe=66990852)
EXPLORE the Arenas and enjoy the different game modes.
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39003262_985625342809911_4235982824831484550_n.png?_nc_cat=105&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=1R2o8_6dt8EQ7kNvgGItCD4&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYCC6-nDbbaCTrPAQ7cg2qntp_i8RTAkTY9-tfMRhJcdZw&oe=6698F389)
